description:
The battle with the Ten Crucifix Insects begins!  The first round is Tsukishima Jinbei vs. Nedzu Jinpachi.  As soon a the battle begins Jinbei is drawn into the castle moat, and forced to fight underwater at a huge disadvantage.  Does Jinbei have a way to win? And what is the true form of the Ten Crucifix Insects!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He Shed His Skin!? The Insect-men`s True Form!!
Masaka no Dappi!? Mushibito no Shin no Sugata!!
まさかの脱皮!? 蟲人の真の姿!!
